1.title: Pythtris
1.description: This project was my first real venture into the Python programming language, it is a Tetris game made using the Pygame library, for a school project.

2.title: Portfolio
2.description: You're lookin' at it! This is my portfolio website built on plain Vanilla JS/HTML/CSS, displaying all of my previously completed projects. In the future I would like to host this page on a more dynamic platform so it can update automatically when I publish a new project. As of right now, it's hosted on github pages, which only offers static webpage hosting, so I can't use a database to update my projects, and so I am relying on manually inputting the title, description, weblinks, etc. for each project into a JSON file.
